source.name: Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide
source.author: Steve Kenson, Jeremy Crawford
source.description:
Welcome to the Sword Coast!
The Sword Coast is a region of Faer√ªn that comprises shining paragons of civilization and culture, perilous locales fraught with dread and evil, and encompassing them all, a wilderness that offers every explorer vast opportunity and simultaneously promises great danger.
While the Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide is a valuable resource for Dungeon Masters, it was crafted with players and their characters foremost in mind. There is a plethora of new character options to intrigue and inspire every member of the adventuring party.
